## CI Checklist

- [ ] `ruff check .` passes
- [ ] `ruff format --check .` passes
- [ ] `black --check .` passes
- [ ] `mypy src/` passes
- [ ] `pytest` passes with no failures
- [ ] Coverage is at or above **90%**
- [ ] Commits are atomic and follow the project's git workflow
